alert.note: Alert for Baker; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; South Central Duval; Southern Columbia; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 12:17PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Nassau, Baker, northeastern Columbia, western Duval and southeastern Charlton Counties through 1245 PM EST... At 1216 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Olustee to 9 miles northeast of Taylor. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callahan, Jacksonville International Arpt, Taylor, Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Maxville, Cisco Gardens, St. George, Bryceville and Cecil Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; Northern Columbia; South Central Duval; Southern Columbia; Trout River; Western Duval
